Vamos, The Event Guide

Co-Founding and Art Direction

  • Co-Founding
  • Interaction Design
  • UI Design
  • Art Direction

Gatherings and events are happening everywhere and all the time, but how do you keep up with where and when – maybe more important: how do you know what you'll like? My co-founders and myself aimed to answer these questions with an iOS and Android App, that makes it easy to know where to crowd will go to.

Font

Comic Sans

Agency

These Guys

Parter Person

Luis-Daniel Alegría

So much has happened since
